reviews.review_msg: Professor Meyer is an informed professor.  She comes to class prepared and expects the same.  Extremely fair marker and extremely helpful.  Exams are tough, get ready to do a lot of readings.  Otherwise she is laid back.

Suppose to be a four hour class, only gives a one hour lecture which is useless, then you proceed to a seminar for two hours!!!! Boaring, zzzzz-hey she usually uses the mock midterm she'll handout as the real midterm.....
